channel.title: How to make items hit 100 every time
channel.description: :confused:I was thinking about this but dont know how to do so.So if you have any suggjestings plz post.And try to make a simple as possabul i'm no great programer like my brother.

item.title: How to make items hit 100 every time
item.dc:creator: @hybrent hybrent
item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

Go in item.cfg. Once in find the item you want to change by using ctrl + f. Once you find it go past the first three numbers. There should be several more numbers. Those are the item bonuses. Change them all to like 1000+ and you will always 1 hit kill.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items hit 100 every time
